resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158686</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158686</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1214</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Midbar Trek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Midbar Trek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage de Midbar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trek De Midbar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio Di Midbar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι Midbar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Midbar Emigra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this Webquest, learners learn about the desert in Tanakh, its role in biblical history and what it was like to live and wander in the desert for forty years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">desert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forty years</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie in diesem Webquest erlernen Anfänger über 
die Wüste in Tanakh, seine Rolle in der biblischen Geschichte und was
es in die Wüste für vierzig Jahre leben und wander sollte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce Webquest, les étudiants se renseignent 
sur le désert dans Tanakh, son rôle dans l'histoire biblique et 
comme ce qu'il devait vivre et errer dans le désert pendant quarante 
années.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste Webquest, os learners aprendem sobre o 
deserto em Tanakh, seu papel no history biblical e o que devia como 
viver e vaguear no deserto por quarenta anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo Webquest, i principianti imparano circa
il deserto in Tanakh, il relativo ruolo nella storia biblica e che 
cosa doveva come vivere e vagare nel deserto per quaranta anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το Webquest, οι αρχάριοι μαθαίνουν για την 
έρημο σε Tanakh, ο ρόλος του στη βιβλική ιστορία και τι 
επρόκειτο όπως να ζήσει και να περιπλανηθεί στην έρημο για 
σαράντα έτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este Webquest, los principiantes aprenden 
sobre el desierto en Tanakh, su papel en historia bíblica y como 
cuál debía vivir y vagar en el desierto por cuarenta años.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wüste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vierzig Jahre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">désert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quarante ans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mais webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deserto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bible</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">deserto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tanach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έρημος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
